  • Reference

    Get gene co-ordinates from MAGMA hg19 file with genes overlapping MHC region removed

    get_gene_coordinates.Rd

    Get gene co-ordinates from MAGMA hg19 file with genes overlapping MHC region removed

    Usage

    get_gene_coordinates(mhc_genes = NULL)

    Arguments

    mhc_genes

    A vector of genes overlapping the MHC region.

    Value

    A set of gene co-ordinates

    Examples

    get_gene_coordinates(c('SPI1', 'MEF2C', 'GAD1', 'TREM2', 'NEUROD1'))
#> 
#> 
#> Dowloading MAGMA hg19 reference file ...
